This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL cos(0) should be used-value-equivalent to 1 assert_not_equals: cos(0) isn't valid in 'transform'; got the default value instead. got disallowed value "none"
FAIL sin(0) should be used-value-equivalent to 0 assert_not_equals: sin(0) isn't valid in 'transform'; got the default value instead. got disallowed value "none"
FAIL tan(0) should be used-value-equivalent to 0 assert_not_equals: tan(0) isn't valid in 'transform'; got the default value instead. got disallowed value "none"

Harness: the test ran to completion.
